description.value:
Cold

Aura 2

Each creature that enters the aura or starts its turn there takes 10 cold damage. The ground is coated with ice and becomes difficult terrain, and the squares of the aura are lightly obscured.

Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Cold

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 2d8+8 cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 1d10+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a bite attack, shifts 3 squares, and then makes two claw attacks against a different target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Close burst 3

Trigger: When an enemy misses the dragon with a melee or close attack, at-will

+22 vs Fortitude; 1d10+8 damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

Standard, Recharges When First Bloodied

Close burst 3

Trigger: When first bloodied

Targets slowed or restrained creatures; +22 vs AC; 3d8+8 damage, the dragon pushes the target 3 squares, and the target is knocked prone. This forced movement can affect a creature restrained by the dragon's own breath weapon.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Cold

Standard

Close blast 5

+22 vs Fortitude; 3d8+8 cold damage, and the target is restrained (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +21 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
